description: Medical and academic research tools for finding peer-reviewed literature

tools.name: pubmed_search
tools.description: Search 39M+ peer-reviewed medical citations using NCBI PubMed. Essential for medical causation research, expert witness verification, and standards of care investigation.
examples: python /Tools/medical_research/pubmed_search.py "lumbar disc herniation motor vehicle accident" --sort date --pretty
when_to_use: Research medical causation for case theory
Find literature supporting or contradicting medical opinions
Build medical arguments with peer-reviewed evidence

tools.name: semantic_scholar_search
tools.description: Search 230M+ academic papers with AI-powered relevance ranking and citation tracking. Excellent for tracking expert witness publication quality and finding contradictory research.
when_to_use: Track expert witness publication quality (citation counts)
Verify medical testimony against research consensus
